title: Exploring student identity and experiences in internationalized remote education

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary online learning experience and general multicultural environment understanding
context.additional_context: A process exploring identity formation in an online environment for learners with diverse cultural backgrounds, led by current practitioners.

learning_goals: Learners can analyze the interaction between their cultural identity and remote learning environments.
Learners systematically compare peer experiences using mixed-methods research (surveys + interviews).
Learners can propose three improvements for international distance education through project-based assessment.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
